sentences.sContent: He got out of the car and looked underneath.
It’s near where the railway goes underneath the road.
sentences.sCn: 它靠近铁路从公路下方穿过的地方。

sentences.sContent: ...Chomsky meant that underneath all the differences between public and private languages...

remMethod.val: under ＋ neath(在…之下) → 在下面

trans.tranOther: directly under another object or covered by it
